description: A new and inspired 18” outseam adventure short now constructed of 4-Way stretch, providing a quick drying and durable experience. The latest Layover Trail short now features a self stowing back pocket so you can pack tight and always have a trusty counterpart on hand. The short also features a drawstring closure waistband with zipper fly and front extended long zip pocket with internal stash sleeve intended to accommodate all adventure goods. Back patch pocket with button closure and small stash pocket at back yoke for quick cell phone storage.
name: Roark Layover Trail 2 Shorts - Mens
